channel.title: Comments on: Pat on Comcast’s online team

item.title: By: ComcastMark
item.dc:creator: ComcastMark
item.description:
Looks like I have found you again!:) Anyway, we are here to assist if ever you need our assistance.
Regards,
Mark Casem Comcast Customer Connect National Customer Operations We_Can_Help@cable.comcast.com
